message.text: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting').

properties.author: Sue Wang
properties.description: This code demos the Stored XSS (or Presistent) ==> "Basic Good Case". The servlet retrieves the records from database and reflects it back into the HTTP response after performing the validate, filter, escape and encode of that retrieved data.

properties.author: Charline Cleraux
properties.description: Here we try to get the system property from a specified key and then remove whitespace. If the key is unknown, cmd is null and the null dereference exception is caught. Moreover there is a local control flow complexity, which is a \"switch\" conditional structure.

taxa.name: NULL Pointer Dereference

message.text: Improper Control of Resource Identifiers ('Resource Injection').

properties.description: The test cases shows hard-coded password is not used.
